column4: As a user; I want to authenticate using my Google account so that I can log in easily.
As a user; I want to authenticate using my GitHub account so that I can log in with my developer profile.
As a user; I want to stay authenticated across multiple devices so that I can access my account anywhere.
As a user; I want to log out from my account so that my information is secure when I finish.
As a user; I want to explore the landing page so that I can understand the platform's features and benefits.
As a user; I want to create a new project so that I can organize my diagrams.
As a user; I want to view my project details so that I can track my work.
As a user; I want to update project details so that I can keep information current.
As a user; I want to delete a project so that I can remove unwanted content.
As a user; I want to download project diagrams as images in a compressed ZIP file so that I can use them offline.
As a user; I want to share my project with others so that I can collaborate or showcase my work.
As a user; I want to create a new diagram so that I can visualize my ideas.
As a user; I want to view my diagram so that I can review my work.
As a user; I want to update diagram details so that I can improve my designs.
As a user; I want to delete a diagram so that I can remove unwanted content.
As a user; I want to download diagram images in appropriate formats so that I can use them in other applications.
As a user; I want to control and split views in my workspace so that I can work efficiently.
As a user; I want to edit diagram code in an interactive editor so that I can create diagrams efficiently.
As a user; I want to chat with an AI model to edit diagram code so that I can get assistance with complex diagrams.
As an AI system; I need to respond to user requests and help edit diagram code so that users can create better diagrams.
As a PlantUML Server; I need to render diagram code into diagram images so that users can visualize their work.
As a user; I want to explore the community so that I can discover interesting projects.
As a visitor; I want to explore the community so that I can see what the platform offers.
As a user; I want to comment on projects so that I can provide feedback to other users.
As a user; I want to like/unlike projects so that I can show appreciation for good work.
As a user; I want to share projects so that I can promote interesting content.
As a user; I want to update my comments so that I can correct or improve my feedback.
As a user; I want to delete my comments so that I can remove inappropriate or outdated feedback.
As a user; I want to like/unlike comments so that I can engage in community discussions.
As a user; I want to copy community projects to my workspace so that I can learn from and build upon others' work.
As a user; I want to edit my profile so that I can keep my information current.
As a user; I want to view public projects on profiles so that I can see others' work.
